ab2_adts

Class AbstractMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • ab2_adts.AbstractMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ab2_adts.IException, Matrix
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MatrixArray, MatrixArrayList, MatrixList

    public abstract class AbstractMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements Matrix, ab2_adts.IException
    Author:
    Swaneet Sahoo, Matthias Nitsche

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractMatrix(int m, int n)
      Abstract Implementation for all Matrix subclasses to refactor and shorten Code Implementation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractMatrix

        public AbstractMatrix(int m,
              int n)
        Abstract Implementation for all Matrix subclasses to refactor and shorten Code Implementation. The Index starts by 1 not 0. All indexes are then subtracted by 1.
        Parameters:
        m - m dimension of a Matrix
        n - n dimension of a Matrix

      • mul

        public abstract Matrix mul(Matrix factor)
        Multiply a m x n Matrix with a given m x n Matrix. The M of this has to be equal to the N of the given Matrix.
        Specified by:
        mul in interface Matrix
        Parameters:
        factor - the given Matrix for a m x n Matrix.
        Returns:
        New Matrix with m of this matrix and n of given matrix.

      • add

        public abstract Matrix add(Matrix m)
        Add a m x n Matrix with a given m x n Matrix. This Matrix has to be equal to the given Matrix.
        Specified by:
        add in interface Matrix
        Parameters:
        m - the given Matrix for a m x n Matrix.
        Returns:
        New Matrix.

      • pow

        public abstract Matrix pow(int exponent)
        Multiply this Matrix to the power of n. It is only possible to Multiply a Matrix if M and N are equal.
        Specified by:
        pow in interface Matrix
        Parameters:
        exponent - multiply the Matrix to the power of the exponent.
        Returns:
        New Matrix.

      • copyFrom

        public void copyFrom(Matrix source)
        Copies all the contents of the given Matrix into the current matrix. This is useful for changing the uses Matrix implementation. the contents are then availible in the implementation of "this" matrix.
        Specified by:
        copyFrom in interface Matrix
        Parameters:
        source - the matrix of which the contents are to be taken
